description: The UK's big walkout - and the EU's tough talking - had more than a hint of political theatre.
title: Brexit: Trade talks are back on - but what's changed?
title_page: Brexit: Trade talks are back on - but what's changed? - BBC News
maintext: Instead of rubbishing that concern, as EU figures have often done in the past (noting, amongst other things, that all trade agreements involve two parties signing up to common rules or principles in one form or another), Mr Barnier told the European Parliament that sovereignty was "a legitimate concern," for the UK prime minister.
